user_query: I want to surprise my sister with a unique gift for her birthday. Can you suggest some popular products in the 'Jewelry & Accessories' category on AliExpress? It would be great if you could provide the product names, prices, and website URLs. Also, find out the shipping details for one of the products with the ID 4001017422834. Additionally, could you recommend a reliable courier service for international shipping?

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular products in the 'Jewelry & Accessories' category on AliExpress including their names, prices, and website URLs.
Retrieve the shipping details for the product with ID 4001017422834.
Recommend a reliable courier service for international shipping.
